definition: bourgeois rightist faction (esp. during anti-rightist movement of 1957-58)

definition: bourgeois revolution (in Marx-Leninist theory, a prelude to the proletarian revolution)
pinyin: zi1 chan3 jie1 ji2 ge2 ming4

sentences.english: To establish a fund for replacing depreciable assets.
sentences.chinese: 设立一个基金来替代折旧的资产。

sentences.english: The company changes to control medium company and be bought, it is a kind of means that asset recombines .
sentences.chinese: 企业改制中的企业并购，是资产重组的一种方式。

sentences.english: Some futurists claim that human capital is a company’s greatest asset.
sentences.chinese: 一些未来学家声称公司的人力资本是其最大的资产。

sentences.english: Policymakers may be starting to worry that asset prices are running up too quickly.
sentences.chinese: 决策层可能已经开始担心资产价格的过快增长。

sentences.english: These costs are charged to an asset account entitled organization costs.
sentences.chinese: 这些成本计入一个名为开办费的资产账户。

sentences.english: An absence of the exposure of knowledge-based assets will cause a seriously underrated evaluation of enterprises.
sentences.chinese: 对知识资产披露的缺失使企业价值被严重低估。

sentences.english: Invest in a dairy farm and you'll have lots of liquid assets.
sentences.chinese: 投资牛奶场，你会有很多流动资产。

sentences.english: The thesis mainly demonstrates the securitization from the perspective of Cross-Border.
sentences.chinese: 本文主要从跨国性的视角向读者展示资产证券化。

sentences.english: The only asset that survived was its URL.
sentences.chinese: 现在唯一幸存下来的资产就是其网址。

sentences.english: Largely because of the jewelry bear market, De Beers’s fortunes have sunk.
sentences.chinese: 主要因为珠宝市场熊市，德比尔斯公司资产缩水。

sentences.english: If you try to walk away from the mortgage, the bank will come after your personal assets.
sentences.chinese: 如果有人试图赖账，银行便会查封他的个人资产。

sentences.english: Investing is the use of capital to acquire assets such as buildings and equipment.
sentences.chinese: 投资勾当与投资购建资产例如建筑物和装备相关。

sentences.english: Net worth is defined as assets minus liabilities.
sentences.chinese: 这里净资产是指资产减去债务。

sentences.english: Net worth is defined as assets minus liabilities.
sentences.chinese: 这里净资产是指资产减去债务。

sentences.english: Illustrated under the direction of Robert Kretschmer (1818–1872), they met with wide approval from the educated bourgeoisie.
sentences.chinese: 它们获得了资产阶级教育界的广泛认可。

sentences.english: Its assets were later bought up by Barclays.
sentences.chinese: 它的资产随后被巴克莱如数购进。

definition: to be in debt/to incur debts/liability (finance)
to purchase (from various places)/to acquire (a company)
merger and acquisition (M and A)/acquisition/to take over
